contentrichtext.text: ''This page is an archive of the discussion surrounding the proposed deletion of the page entitled [[Student Superhero]].''' '''This page is kept as an historic record.''' '''The result of the debate was to delete the article.''' ---- Vanity and what passes for wit in the mind of the contemporary student. VfD also on [[Thomas Taylor]] and [[Robert Westwood]], the alleged Superheros. Meanwhile I'll check the author's other edits... --[[User:Tagishsimon|Tagishsimon]] * Delete. Vanity. - [[User:MykReeve|MykReeve]] 13:31, 16 May 2004 (UTC) * Delete. I agree with MykReeve [[User:EddEdmondson|EddEdmondson]] 13:41, 16 May 2004 (UTC) * I guess you'd have to really know more about the culture at the University of Wolverhampton. But you don't, do you? ** Correct. I don't, but I think that's irrelevant to the issue of whether or not these articles are suitable for inclusion in an encyclopedia. - [[User:MykReeve|MykReeve]] 14:54, 16 May 2004 (UTC) ** Note: [http://en.wikipedia.org/w/wiki.phtml?title=Wikipedia&diff=3604163&oldid=3604070 vandalism] is unlikely to help your case. [[User:Grendelkhan|Grendelkhan]] 16:56, 2004 May 16 (UTC) **Comment: No, I don't think we do need to know. The article speaks for itself. [[user:andrewa/minimum waste of time|MWOT]]. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] 20:09, 16 May 2004 (UTC) * '''Delete'''. Article is not of general interest. Lack of googlespoor makes it impossible to easily verify. - [[User:Topbanana|TB]] 15:15, 16 May 2004 (UTC) * Delete. Joke, probable vanity. [[User:Andrewa|Andrewa]] 19:29, 16 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete and move to BJAODN. --[[User:Beelzebubs|Beelzebubs]] 19:35, 16 May 2004 (UTC) *And these people are allegedly adults? Delete. [[User:RickK|Rick]]'''[[User talk:RickK|K''']] 20:47, 16 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete. The mention of people citing Wikipedia articles in chatrooms in the edit above warms the cockles of my heart, however. [[User:Meelar|Meelar]] 20:55, 16 May 2004 (UTC) * Delete them all. Not funny enough for BJAODN. -- [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]|[[User talk:Cyrius|&#9998]] 21:38, May 16, 2004 (UTC) *Vanity. Delete. Unless, prior to end of deletion debate, someone adds to the article clear, convincing, and verifiable evidence of the notability of the "Superheros." [[User:Dpbsmith|Dpbsmith]] 22:38, 16 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete. Unverifiable. [[User:Andris|Andris]] 01:02, May 17, 2004 (UTC) *Delete. Non-notable. --[[User:Starx|Starx]] 01:41, 17 May 2004 (UTC) *Delete all. Agree with [[User:Cyrius|Cyrius]]. - [[User:Lucky 6.9|Lucky 6.9]] 16:28, 17 May 2004 (UTC) ---- This page is now preserved as an archive of the debate and is no longer 'live'. Subsequent comments on the issue or the deletion should be placed on other relevant 'live' pages. '''Please do not edit this page.''' ----
